text.p: Innovo Group Inc said its sales for the month of January 1997 were $489,078, as compared with sales of $568,614 for January 1996.
The company's domestic sales increased by 38 percent over the same period in 1996 to $118,732.

Innovo says it expects to report a total of about $350,000 in international sales for the first calendar quarter of 1997 which would be a 30 percent increase over sales of $269,000 for the first calendar quarter of 1996.
Innovo manufactures and markets fashion and sports-licensed tote bags, backpacks and duffle bags.
